Title: [ANN][ICO] SureRemit - An Ecosystem for Global Non-cash Remittances

Many activities like merchant acquisition, retail marketing and app improvements (security and design) are on-going daily activities, therefore not reflected in detail in the roadmap. The intensity of these activities also depends on the implementation of Roadmap goals, third-party cooperation, budget and market dynamics.

Author: morantis
Title: [ANN][ICO] SureRemit - An Ecosystem for Global Non-cash Remittances
Body: SureRemit Weekly: New Merchant and More… (Nov. 30th 2018)  Good news! We have reached an agreement with a voucher/gift card partner for the Turkish market and the teams are currently working on integration. More than 50 new merchants will be added varying from supermarkets, textile/fashion stores, electronics stores, e-commerce sites, discount vouchers, utility payments, TV subscription plans and more. Many thanks to our community members Bora and Deniz for their support! We want to make the vouchers available ASAP, depending on integration process and testing, the vouchers should be available in 2 to 3 weeks or even sooner when possible.  https://medium.com/sureremit/sureremit-weekly-new-merchants-3181b5f24a95

Author: filsid
Title: [ANN][ICO] SureRemit - An Ecosystem for Global Non-cash Remittances
Body: The SureRemit App: A First Look https://medium.com/sureremit/the-sureremit-app-a-first-look-d42ccf34ccd0 There’s a bit of a negative reputation out there about tokenized projects with too many failing to launch long after their Initial Coin Offering (ICO). Our goal was to go from ICO to live within a very short time so that our RMT token will not diverge too far away from its true utility, and fix/improve along the way. We’re excited to finally present the first version of the SureRemit application to our expectant community.

Thank you!!

Author: Jekwizor
Title: [ANN][ICO] SureRemit - An Ecosystem for Global Non-cash Remittances
Body: SureRemit App Launch Date  It’s with great pleasure that we announce the launch date of the SureRemit app, we’ll launch the app on the 30th of July 2018! We had to overcome several hurdles, but managed to deal with them all. The credit card integration is a success and has a very intuitive design. We will use the time until app launch to continue improving the app, testing and preparing sales & marketing and support.  When the app is launched we’ll organize an ‘AMA’ with the team to provide you with the opportunity to have any questions answered. https://medium.com/sureremit/sureremit-app-launch-date-976f90bdfcdd

Author: Kempenovak
Title: [ANN][ICO] SureRemit - An Ecosystem for Global Non-cash Remittances
Body: I had an opportunity to cooperate with their team and give feedback with  token swap and suggested secure and proper way of doing smart contract on stellar for that purpose. I never doubted in them since ama, but the way how they technically executed this (they did it even better than I suggested and tons of testing invested, they don’t allow mistakes) perfectly just shows how projects on Blockchain should actually be done. As a blockchain dev myself I am very strict and allergic at bad code and sloppy execution. I myself am developer in very successful and well known blockchain project(gambling) and vouch for this project and team. There is no question why all big venture capital is behind this. Their full app with credit card token purchase implemented (buying orders directly from exchange with fiat), company suregifts running business 4 years now (they have user base, merchant base), talking with top10 exchanges, marketing full run in 2 weeks, running on stellar network(ibm, stripe,...) is going to explode. They don’t hype, they just work behind and provide results, that’s the main reason token price is still low(500mio token circulation) at 3c. I made mistake not buying stellar at 2c last year(or even ripple for sake of profit), not wasting lifetime opportunity again.  (Sorry for grammar, phone, 1:30am and on vacation)
